channel.title: All servers are showing as down
channel.description:
Please help, when we put in a server ip, and attempt to log in, it says "Error Connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to create your own" We do that and it says "The server has successfully started. now just log in with any username and any password. have fun." we get the option to click "ok" we do so and it comes up with the screen start server and enter. clicking enter comes up with our default ip which is 127.0.0.1 we put in username and password it says "Error Connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to create your own" again. we have tried like 30 different server ips and they all say the same.
Please help me =[
(at the bottom of the screen it also says this if its helpful) [04:51:35] Starting MoparScape 3.2 [04:51:35] Playing 0-hangar.mid [04:51:36] [04:51:36] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2 [04:51:36] News: first generation client editing, with a built [04:51:36] News: in private server, music player capable of playing [04:51:36] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and [04:51:36] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help [04:51:36] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf [04:51:36] News: and post in my thread. Y'all have fun. [04:51:36] News: [04:51:36] News: For online servers, look at the [04:51:36] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com [04:51:36] News: [04:51:36] News: -moparisthebest [04:51:36] Server : 127.0.0.1 [04:51:36] [04:51:36] [04:51:36] Loaded 0 random handlers [04:51:36] # Loading controllers [04:52:06] [04:52:06] Logging into (baconeta, *****) [04:52:06] Your UID is: 434383 Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? [04:52:14] [04:52:14] Logging into (baconeta, *****) [04:52:14] Your UID is: 434383 [04:53:01] [04:53:01] Logging into (baconeta, *****) [04:53:01] Your UID is: 434383 [04:53:42] [04:53:42] Logging into (baconeta, *****)
thanks for any and all help, baconeta

item.title: All servers are showing as down
item.dc:creator: @mr.cool mr.cool ^_^
item.description:
@mr.cool wrote:

try this click on add port and type 43594 thats the default port and im asuming you already started a sever so then type your username and pass it should let you in if not try deleating moparscape from your computer and downloading it again but dont change nothing just click start sever and type your usename and pass it should work. it worked for me

Read full topic

item.title: All servers are showing as down
item.dc:creator: @baconeta baconeta
item.description:
@baconeta wrote:

Please help, when we put in a server ip, and attempt to log in, it says
“Error Connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to create your own”
We do that and it says
“The server has successfully started. now just log in with any username and any password. have fun.”
we get the option to click “ok”
we do so and it comes up with the screen start server and enter. clicking enter comes up with our default ip which is 127.0.0.1
we put in username and password it says “Error Connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel and then start server to create your own” again.
we have tried like 30 different server ips and they all say the same.

Please help me =[
